Log into the ValidMind UI

Log into our cloud-hosted platform UI to collaborate with others.

Prerequisites

  • A valid email address registered with the ValidMind platform.
  • Your password associated with the registered email address.

Steps

Using a company VPC?

Log in through AWS PrivateLink: https://private.prod.vm.validmind.ai

  1. In a web browser, go to https://app.dev.vm.validmind.ai/.
  2. Click Log In and enter your email address and password.
  3. Click Continue.

After successful login, you are redirected to the main dashboard of the ValidMind UI where you can start exploring the features of the ValidMind platform.
